summary:
Uzbekistan is a landlocked country in Central Asia, bordered by five other nations. It has a rich history, dating back to ancient nomads and empires. The region experienced various rulers, including the Achaemenid Empire, the Mongols, and the Timurid dynasty. It became part of the Russian Empire in the 19th century and later the Soviet Union. Uzbekistan gained independence in 1991.

The country is led by a president and has 12 regions. It is known for its cotton production, electricity generation, and natural gas reserves. Uzbekistan is working on economic reforms and improving relations with neighboring countries.
title: Uzbekistan
